items.sentence: I suppose you want to live in Boston with Tom.
I suspect Tom expects me to help Mary do that.
I thought you wanted to learn to speak French.
I walked home in the rain without an umbrella.
I want to apologize for everything I\'ve done.
I want to tell Tom that he shouldn\'t do that.
Tom said he didn\'t think he ought to do that.
Is this the first time you\'ve traveled alone?
Tom and Mary said they haven\'t yet been paid.
There are three children in the swimming pool.
